Package.Name: ZoneMinder
Package.Author: Sebastien Warin
Package.Description: Connect your ZoneMinder (>= 1.29) video security system to Constellation

Setting.name: UseLoginAPI
Setting.defaultValue: Use the login API for ZM >= 1.32

Setting.name: Password
Setting.description: ZoneMinder password (required if UseLoginAPI is enabled)

Setting.name: PasswordHash
Setting.description: ZoneMinder password hash (required if UseLoginAPI is disabled)

Setting.name: SecretHash
Setting.description: ZoneMinder secret hash (required if UseLoginAPI is disabled)

Setting.name: ForwardEvents
Setting.description: Sends message to a Constellation group on ZoneMinder's event

Setting.name: EventsGroupName
Setting.description: The name of the Constellation group where send the OnZoneMinderEvent message

Setting.name: SystemRefreshInterval
Setting.description: Interval (in ms) to refresh host data

Setting.name: MonitorsRefreshInterval
Setting.description: Interval (in ms) to refresh monitors data

Setting.name: EventsRefreshInterval
Setting.description: Interval (in ms) to refresh events data
